title: DSC Alarm: Create envisalink integration package
EAP773 upstairs AP frequent disconnects - investigate power/firmware
description:
## Problem
EAP773(US) v1.0 upstairs AP (MAC: A8-29-48-C0-01-60, IP: 192.168.1.22) experiencing frequent disconnects.

## Root Cause (FOUND)
**Switch Port 4 + marginal cable combination** caused link instability:
- Port 4 was only delivering 10.8W (vs needed 24W) with frequent link DOWN events
- The Ethernet cable to UpstairsAP only negotiates 100Mbps (should be 2.5G capable)
- Combination of marginal cable + Port 4 PHY caused repeated disconnects

## Resolution
- Swapped ports: UpstairsAP moved from Port 4 → Port 3
- AP immediately stable: 1h 19m+ uptime (vs disconnecting every few minutes)
- Port 3 provides stable 11.2W PoE at 100Mbps link
- Port 4 confirmed working (negotiates 2.5G with other device)

## Current State
- ✅ AP stable on Port 3
- ⚠️ Running at 100Mbps (cable limitation, not switch)
- ⚠️ Firmware still 1.0.14 (upgrade recommended)

## Remaining Tasks
- [ ] Replace cable to upstairs (user plans to do this)
- [ ] Upgrade firmware: 1.0.14 → 1.1.2 → 1.2.0 (files at /tmp/ on controller)

## References
- Omada Controller: 192.168.1.47
- Firmware files: /home/dev/workspace/Omada_firmware/EAP773/
- Firmware thread: https://community.tp-link.com/en/business/forum/topic/854656

title: Deploy promtail to remaining containers
description:
24 containers are missing promtail configuration for log shipping to Loki.

Priority 1 (3 containers):
- 124 mqtt - MQTT broker logs
- 132 uptime-kuma - Monitoring service meta-logs
- 141 vaultwarden-standby - Standby credential service

Priority 2 (14 containers):
- 108 tandoor, 109 esphome, 111 omada-controller, 112 wikijs
- 115 memos, 117 hoarder, 125 zwave-js-ui, 127 proxmox-datacenter-manager
- 135 stork-server, 175 seed2smoke, 210 model-catalog
- 1260 vikunja, 1300 wikijs-integration

Priority 3 (7 containers - low value):
- 102 cloudflared, 103 watchyourlan, 104 myspeed, 106 pairdrop
- 118 adguard-sync, 123 gitopsdashboard, 150 homepage, 2000 github-runner

See: operations/docs/monitoring/promtail-audit-20260130.md
